Game information:

New York, the end of 1929. Starting difficult period
for the American people - the Great Depression. Times
when just a few months, the country mired in corruption,
the American dream will turn into dust and shaken faith
in God. The protagonist quest Jack Del Nero, a former
police officer, earns his living sleuthing and periodically
flooded whiskey his memories of a successful past. Once in
the hands of him misses the murder case of his colleague Emily.

Face Noir
